title: Tron.Unifi | SUN Pairs Update
body:
Since may the 26th, sun.io announced that users would have to swap their SUNOLD tokens to the new SUN tokens to be able to use DeFi Applications using SUN on tron.

Feel free to check the tweet here: twitter.com/defi_sunio/status/1397432974480576512

The SUNOLD contract address is: TKkeiboTkxXKJpbmVFbv4a8ov5rAfRDMf9

New Sun with SUN contract address: TSSMHYeV2uE9qYH95DqyoCuNCzEL1NvU3S

Currently, at tron.unifiprotocol.com, there is liquidity and trading volume on the SUNOLD pair.

I would like to propose the following:

**1. Rename the current SUN / TRX pair to SUNOLD/TRX to avoid confusion**

**2. Create a new pair with the new SUN token denominated as SUN / TRX**

NB: We could opt to remove the SUNOLD pair after a couple of months when most users should have migrated.

NB2: By passing this proposal and implementing this quickly, unifiprotocol could become the first AMM after justswap to implement the new SUN token on our exchange.. Something like free PR?!



Governance Feedback:
- *markdown is allowed but the whole system is very buggy. No way to Save a draft and multiple markdown styles are not allowed to post
author: 0x7A5F2b8C528a2271503be40462934C5ad145F1b9
